sentence.text: What you overheard that day did have something to do with Martin in a way .
They returned to the hotel where Norman overheard one porter say , ` My god , he 's with them . "
I overheard him say that he lost his desire , lost his drive and everything .
` You overheard what I was saying to Victoria , did n't you , Doctor ?
He found out when he overheard your parents quarrelling one night . "
As a child I overheard two women talking .
I overheard a conversation between two women , one of whom was talking about her new grandchild .
Celia and Brassard , who had overheard everything from the outer office , exchanged rueful glances .
Abashed , realising that he had overheard her conversation with Victoria , Shelley did n't try to make excuses .
Jinkwa overheard the exchange .
One of the SS officers overheard her .
For he is embarrassed when people overhear him .
Maisie overheard this remark .
Part of it was overheard by one of the village ladies waiting just outside the telephone box .
` It 's the same thing as people talking too loudly in public places so they can be overheard by strangers .
He also held his forefinger to his lips , indicating that they might be overheard .
` Nazis , " she said , once the door was shut and she could n't be overheard .
She immediately recognized Angel 's brothers and even overheard some of their conversation .
A discussion I overheard concerned the merits of an airing cupboard as winter quarters for fly-traps .
` I overheard you two talking , " Bernard replied with a sheepish grin .
My father overheard and , without consulting me or waiting to hear my reply , forbade him the house .
